## Current Projects

### Doubly Robust Methods for Longitudinal Data
Developing machine learning methods that maintain causal interpretability in panel studies.

### Heterogeneous Treatment Effects
Investigating how policy impacts vary across different populations and contexts.

### Sensitivity Analysis Frameworks
Creating tools to assess the robustness of causal conclusions to unmeasured confounding.
